alert.note: Alert for Marshall (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 2:22PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Marshall County through 400 PM CDT... At 320 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorms over northern Marshall County, the strongest being over Kidder, or 8 miles north of Britton, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Britton and Westwood Colony around 335 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Sunset Colony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
